Rational Dress Society JUMPSUITS come with and without bust darts for the accommodation of breasts. “Fitted” denotes a monogarment with small bust darts for comrades who would prefer shaping around the chest. “Unfitted” monogarments have a slightly roomier fit throughout the top portion of the garment. Both “Unfitted” and “Fitted” JUMPSUITS have a semi-tailored silhouette allowing for easy range of movement.
